title: THE ISLE OF REMORAY! - Anno 1800 160+ Modded Campaign in 2025 (Episode 35)

tasks.task: Fence in the island's key areas and build infrastructure on the water.
subtasks: Pre-plan the oil refinery, placing it and connecting it with tracks to avoid noise complaints.
Build and link up train tracks for efficient transportation and resource distribution.
Construct the main harbor area with depots and fisheries, ensuring proper layout for trade and resource management.
Generate and manage populations of farmers and workers to meet labor demands, including upgrades and supplies.
Establish farm fields for crops such as grains, vegetables, and vineyards, utilizing tractor barns and fuel stations.
Connect and manage oil, electricity, and other utilities for the island's infrastructure.
Set up administrative buildings and public services to ensure population growth and local prosperity.
Implement beautification efforts, including roads, buildings, and amenities, to enhance the island's appearance and functionality.

tasks.task: Upgrade the island's transportation and trade networks.
subtasks: Install efficient road systems and ensure proper connections between different infrastructure components.
Expand and manage airship trade routes, ensuring timely delivery of resources and goods.
Construct and maintain docks and harbors to facilitate ship traffic and trade activities.
Strengthen the island's trade agreements and negotiate with the Kingdom of Sapin for mutual benefits, including the export of crops.

tasks.task: Expand and maintain farmlands to meet the region's agricultural potential.
subtasks: Clear and prepare land for various types of crops and fields.
Deploy farm machinery and resources (e.g., tractors, fuel, fertilizers) to optimize crop yields.
Utilize advanced farming techniques and technologies (e.g., electric flour mills) to enhance efficiency and productivity.
Plan and rotate crops to maintain soil health and fertility, preventing overuse and exhaustion.

tasks.task: Implement trade agreements and support the kingdom of Sapin's recovery.
subtasks: Establish and maintain communication with stakeholders for trade negotiations and support.
Monitor and manage resource extraction (e.g., oil, minerals) ethically and sustainably.
Provide assistance and guidance to the local population, addressing their needs and concerns for better relations.
